# rightThumbstick

**Type Property**

The name of the right thumbstick on a directional pad element.

## Declaration

```swift
static let rightThumbstick: GCDirectionPadElementName
```

## Getting the directional pad component names

- **directionPad**: The name of the direction pad on a directional pad element.
- **leftThumbstick**: The name of the left thumbstick on a directional pad element.
